nodes.excerpt: Notion is a great tool for many things. Start taking advantage of Notion without effort.
nodes.title: Notion Starter Pack - Get started in Notion fast and easy
nodes.author: Easlo

nodes.excerpt: Second Brain is a digital system made for entrepreneurs, freelancers, content creators and students to capture and organize everything in one place.
nodes.title: Notion Second Brain - A Notion system for capturing and organizing your thoughts
nodes.author: Easlo

nodes.excerpt: A collaborative mixed methods User Research platform. Taking an unconventional approach with a browser extension and web app you can capture and share data analysis, user research, and learnings directly in context, with your team from anywhere you work.
nodes.title: Avrio - Capture & share data analysis, user research, and learnings
nodes.author: Nir Eyal

nodes.excerpt: Notabase is a powerful and easy-to-use note-taking app for networked thinking. Connect your ideas together and write more effortlessly.
nodes.title: Notabase - Easy-to-use note-taking app for networked thinking
nodes.author: Richard Chu

nodes.excerpt: *The Ultimate Companion App For Notion* â†’ Celebrate ANY Win You Can Track In Notion â†’ Engage In Party Quests And Slay Dragons With Your Friends â†’ Get Motivated By Friendly Competition With Our Community â†’ Create Custom Embeddable Components For Notion Pages

nodes.excerpt: Context Note is a free chrome extension that help you take notes on the web with their context. With the context, we could understand and recall the details of the notes better while reviewing. A handy tag system is also provided to manage the notes neatly.
nodes.title: Context Note - take notes on the web with their context
nodes.author: Jim Chan

nodes.excerpt: The note-taking tool for students, researchers, and professionals. Built-in flashcards, PDFs, backlinks, and more - to help you learn, stay organized, and think.
nodes.title: RemNote - The all-in-one tool for thinking and learning
nodes.author: Nick Abouzeid

nodes.excerpt: Memo is a beautiful history-based notes app built with iOS design guidelines in mind. Additions and deletions are automatically stored in the history timeline, which can be scrubbed to travel forwards and backwards in time through the note.
nodes.title: Memo - Simple timelines for your notes
nodes.author: JPEGuin

nodes.excerpt: Inspired by The Bullet Journal Method by Ryder Carroll, this application helps you record and organize content in a way similar to bullet journaling. The idea of this app is to help its users focus on intentionality and productivity.
nodes.title: Bullet Planning - Bullet journaling made simple
nodes.author: Nattu

nodes.excerpt: Create and share amazing Sketchnotes in 5 mins. With RapidSketch you have access to templates, hand-drawn icons, and fonts, which make creating a Sketchnote super easy and fast.
nodes.title: RapidSketch - Create and share amazing sketchnotes in 5 mins
nodes.author: Ankit Jena

nodes.excerpt: flomo is a minimal memo-taking tool based on zettelkasten method. Both the textbox and the API in flomo provide a seamless and rapid memo-taking experience. With daily review and cloud syncing, you can check and write memos across all platforms.
nodes.title: flomo - The minimal memo taking tool to empower better thinking
nodes.author: Plidezus Leo

nodes.excerpt: NoteLedge is the best note-taking app for creatives and designers. It comes with powerful creative tools for you to quickly capture ideas from Pinterest and web pages, organize everything in one place, and make sketches to start your own design right away!
nodes.title: NoteLedge - Take better notes, your way
nodes.author: Vlad Shvets

nodes.excerpt: Poppins makes your Slack actionable by capturing messages as action items and discussion topics right inside Slack without switching context, saving ~an hour! ğŸŒ 100's of teams trust Poppins globally ğŸ… #1 Brilliant Bot on Slack Apps ğŸ† #1 New & Noteworthy App

nodes.excerpt: ReadMark is an RSS reader that is... markable. Besides essential features that every other RSS readers and read-later services offer, ReadMark uniquely provides you a smooth and distraction-free note taking experience, "Mark". Try it!
nodes.title: ReadMark - An RSS reader that is markable.
nodes.author: Junyu Wang | ç‹ä¿Šç…œ

nodes.excerpt: Lekh is a digital notebook that comes with the experience of a physical notebook. It comes with colorful highlighters, different page styles, sticky notes and more. It is a free Progressive Web Application and can be downloaded to be used offline.
nodes.title: Lekh - Your digital notebook for more interactive note-taking
nodes.author: Ankush Arudkar

nodes.excerpt: The simple daily practice of creating a summary of the events, actions and tasks in your day dramatically increases your awareness, productivity and focus as you strive to achieve your goals. Logtime helps to do this practice simply and effectively.
nodes.title: Logtime - Diary, tasks and goals. All-in-one productivity solution.
nodes.author: Ivan Mart

nodes.excerpt: Clarity is the simplest productivity app ever made. Run your team with a single weekly doc. Keep everyone on the same page without endless configuration & maintenance. Focus your energy on what you do best.
nodes.title: Clarity - The simplest productivity app ever made

nodes.excerpt: Jam on Chrome is a chrome extension that lets you comment, annotate, and even update your website copy, right on the page.
nodes.title: Jam on Chrome - Sticky notes for the web - comment right on your website

nodes.title: Clover - A creative workspace with notes, whiteboards, tasks, & more

nodes.excerpt: TickTick is an all-in-one productivity app that is simple to use. It helps people get the most out of their life by managing to-dos, scheduling on a calendar, taking notes, and staying focused all in one place.
nodes.title: TickTick 6.0 - Not only efficient, but also more personalized than ever
nodes.author: Damon

nodes.excerpt: Turn your notes about any particular topic to podcasts automatically. Listen to them over and over again for convenience and to retain the information better. Share your knowledge with the world with a click of a button. Check out https://www.note-bytes.com/
nodes.title: NoteBytes - Turn your notes into podcasts and share them with the world

nodes.excerpt: A Python package to copy all your Kindle highlights and notes to a database in Notion. Plug in your Kindle device to your PC to run this script. Requires Python 3.9+ installed on your system.
